Nisma Cherrat (Nisma Bux-Cherrat, amụrụ ya n'afọ 1969 na Casablanca, Morocco) bụ onye Afro-German na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo.
O tolitere na mpaghara Schwarzwald na Germany ma gaa afọ 1989 ruo afọ 1992 Neue Münchner Schauspielschule
Ọ gụrụ abụ oge ochie n'afọ 1993 ruo afọ 1995 na Bennie Gillette na Munich na Jazzschool München
Nisma Cherrat bụ onye guzobere SFD - Schwarze Filmschaffende na Deutschland (Black Artists in German Film).

A zụrụ Cherrat na ụlọ akwụkwọ Schlaffhorst-Andersen dị na Bad Nenndorf dị ka onye nkuzi maka ọgwụgwọ iku ume na okwu. Kemgbe ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka ọrụ nyocha na Freiburger Institute for Musicians' Medicine nke Mahadum Egwu na Freiburg, Germany.
